A message that can hold any of the supported value types.

params.name: data.double_value

params.name: data.timestamp_value
params.description: A timestamp value. Precise only to microseconds. When stored, any additional precision is rounded down.

params.name: data.string_value
params.description: A string value. The string, represented as UTF-8, must not exceed 1 MiB - 89 bytes. Only the first 1,500 bytes of the UTF-8 representation are considered by queries.

params.name: data.bytes_value
params.description: A bytes value. Must not exceed 1 MiB - 89 bytes. Only the first 1,500 bytes are considered by queries.

params.name: data.reference_value
params.description: A reference to a document. For example: projects/{project_id}/databases/{database_id}/documents/{document_path}.

params.name: data.geo_point_value
params.description: A geo point value representing a point on the surface of Earth.

params.name: data.array_value
params.description: An array value. Cannot directly contain another array value, though can contain an map which contains another array.

params.name: data.map_value
params.description: A map value.
